alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 2:10PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold and persistent wind chills of 25 to 40 below zero. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: People are urged to stay indoors until conditions improve. If you must go outside, dress in layers. Several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. Cover exposed skin to reduce your risk of frostbite or hypothermia. Gloves, a scarf, and a hat will keep you from losing your body heat. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
